items.name: adamId
items.desc: The adamId used in your campaign. Use Get a Campaign or Get All Campaigns to obtain your adamId and correlate it to the correct campaign.

items.name: contentProviderId
items.desc: A unique identifier of the registered content owner.

items.name: creationTime
items.desc: The date and time the object was created.This field is not modifiable.

items.name: id
items.desc: A unique string to identify a product page on App Store Connect. For example, 45812c9b-c296-43d3-c6a0-c5a02f74bf6e.

items.name: isDefault
items.desc: Indicates if the custom product page is the default on App Store Connect.

items.name: localization
items.desc: Localized metadata used on a product page with app preview.

items.name: modificationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the most recent modification of the object.This field is not modifiable.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of your custom product page, as input through App Store Connect.
